name: own
chn: adj. & pron. 自己的，本人的
example_en: She decorated her own room with bright colors.
example_cn: 她用鲜艳的颜色装饰了自己的房间。
word_family: owner (n. 所有者), ownership (n. 所有权), self-owned (adj. 自有的)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'āgen'，意为'自己的'。联想记忆：想象一个人站在自己的房子前，自豪地说'这是我的'。图像记忆：画一个人站在标有'OWN'的房子前，手里拿着钥匙。

image_prompt.main_image: A young person standing in front of a brightly colored room, smiling proudly, with a sign that says 'My Own Room' on the door.
image_prompt.example_image: A girl painting the walls of her room with vibrant colors, with paint cans and brushes scattered around, showing her personal touch in decorating her own space.
